20101207081909.333|20101207081910.167|CCO|    A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE
20101207081910.167|20101207081911.000|CCO|  PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.
20101207081911.000|20101207081912.250|CCO|   PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK
20101207081912.250|20101207081913.500|CCO|    BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS
20101207081913.500|20101207081914.750|CCO| OF TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN,
20101207081914.750|20101207081916.000|CCO| SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE.
20101207081916.000|20101207081917.250|CCO|  TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101207081917.250|20101207081918.500|CCO|  IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS
20101207081918.500|20101207081919.750|CCO|  OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101207081919.750|20101207081921.000|CCO|       IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,
20101207081921.000|20101207081922.250|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101207081922.250|20101207081923.500|CCO|  ANTIDEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE
20101207081923.500|20101207081924.750|CCO|       SUICIDAL THOUGHTS
20101207081924.750|20101207081926.000|CCO|   AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,
20101207081926.000|20101207081927.250|CCO|    TEENS AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101207081927.250|20101207081928.500|CCO|    PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED
20101207081928.500|20101207081929.750|CCO|    FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.
20101207081929.750|20101207081931.000|CCO|DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20101207081931.000|20101207081932.111|CCO|         TAKING PRISTIQ
20101207081932.111|20101207081933.222|CCO|   WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,
20101207081933.222|20101207081934.333|CCO|  ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS
20101207081934.333|20101207081935.444|CCO|    MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
20101207081935.444|20101207081936.556|CCO|        TELL YOUR DOCTOR
20101207081936.556|20101207081937.667|CCO|  ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,
20101207081937.667|20101207081938.778|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
20101207081938.778|20101207081939.889|CCO|     TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY
20101207081939.889|20101207081941.000|CCO|  LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.
20101207081941.000|20101207081942.111|CCO|  PRISTIQ MAY CAUSE OR WORSEN
20101207081942.111|20101207081943.222|CCO|      HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE,
20101207081943.222|20101207081944.333|CCO| HIGH CHOLESTEROL, OR GLAUCOMA.
20101207081944.333|20101207081945.444|CCO|        TELL YOUR DOCTOR
20101207081945.444|20101207081946.556|CCO|   IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE
20101207081946.556|20101207081947.667|CCO|      OR BEFORE YOU REDUCE
20101207081947.667|20101207081948.778|CCO|    OR STOP TAKING PRISTIQ.
